trans-unit.source: Represents a data view on an XML node or collection of XML nodes for an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示 XML 节点或集合的 XML 节点上的数据视图<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control can present its underlying data in both tabular and hierarchical format to Web server controls that bind to it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>控件可以显示其基础数据表格和分层格式 Web 服务器控件，将绑定到它。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> to bind to XML data and present it in list or tabular form, while controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, bind to XML data and present it in hierarchical form.
trans-unit.target: 控件如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>将绑定到 XML 数据并将其呈现以列表或表格形式，同时从派生的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>类，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>，将绑定到 XML 数据并将其以分层形式呈现。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> creates each view type internally through different code paths.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>创建内部通过不同的代码路径每种视图类型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A> method is called on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control, an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> object is created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>对象由创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> method is called, an XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView object is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>方法调用，因此创建 XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView 对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> class is provided for Web server controls that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> and bind to lists and tabular data, while the XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView is provided for Web server controls that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> and bind to hierarchical data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>派生自的 Web 服务器控件提供类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>和绑定到列表和表格数据、 XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView 时提供 web 服务器控件，派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>并将绑定到分层数据。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Internally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeDataBoundControl> classes call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView.Select%2A> method of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> object view to retrieve data from a data source, while a class derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在内部，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeDataBoundControl>类将调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView.Select%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>对象视图，以从数据源，检索数据，而从派生的类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: Like all <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView> helper objects, the XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView defines the operations that the data source can perform with the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: 如所有<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>帮助程序对象，XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView 定义数据源可以使用基础数据执行的操作。</xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Because the XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView class only overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> method, the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control does not support sort expressions or execute, delete, or update operations.
trans-unit.target: 因为 XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView 类仅重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>方法，因此关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>控件不支持排序表达式或执行、 删除或更新操作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of the data items from the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 从基础数据源获取数据项目的列表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable> that is returned by <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> is an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> and can be used like any <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>返回<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>是<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>，可以使用类似于任何<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>集合。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> </xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> method to get an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> and iterate through the collection of <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> nodes, or use `foreach` (in C#) or `For Each` (Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>方法以获取<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>，循环访问集合的<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>节点或使用`foreach`（在 C# 中) 或`For Each`(Visual Basic 中)。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"></xref> collection of data items based on the hierarchical level of the current view.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"> </xref>数据项的集合基于当前视图的层次结构级别。
